item.description:
Saturday Jan 31st, 2009
Pot Luck and Games Night
TC: Gail Walker, gailmwalker@yahoo.com or 617 484-4259
EVENT: Potluck dinner and games night. First we'll have dinner
then play games. For dinner, you can cook it or buy something.
TC has several games or you can bring your own.
MEET: 6-10pm. At TC's home in Belmont. Directions sent to
those who RSVP.
RSVP: Required by Jan 30th to Gail at the address listed above and tell her what food you'll
bring. Event limited to 22 people so don't wait until the
last minute to respond. She'll try to make sure we have a
variety of foods in different categories.
COST: Potluck dish (no pork or shellfish please). $5 for non-members.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to the Event's TC for directions

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Potluck and Games Night
